physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a man. He has both his hands in his pockets and is looking towards the direction where the photograph was captured. He is dressed in military uniform that consists of long pants and a shirt with the sleeves folded at the elbows. The background of the photograph shows greenery and trees.
